special_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a card exiled with Kang into its owner's hand.
[+1]: Draw two cards, then exile two cards from your hand.
[-2]: Exile another target nonland permanent with two time counters on it. It gains suspend.
[-6]: Search your library for any number of noncreature, nonland cards and exile them. Then put up to three cards exiled with Kang into their owners' hands.
